Our team swiftly helped them with their insurance claims and ensured the use of top-quality materials. They chose Certainteed shingles in Weathered Wood, which look fantastic on their new roof!

During the project, we had a misunderstanding about the shingle color. After a few changes, we initially installed the wrong color. Once we realized the mistake, we quickly corrected it, leaving the customer very happy with the final result.

We believe in transparency and always correct our mistakes. Unlike many companies that might have left the wrong color, we made sure the job was done right.

For top-notch roofing services in Concord, NC, trust us to deliver excellent results and exceptional customer service.

projects.name: Linda Scavuzzo
projects.description:
In Denver, NC, we recently received a call from the neighbor of a client we had previously assisted with an insurance claim roof replacement. She was concerned about her roof and asked us to inspect it. Upon our thorough inspection, we found numerous missing and wind-creased shingles.

After she filed a claim, we met with the adjuster, who confirmed the damage. However, the initial claim was denied, and they suggested only repairing a few shingles instead of replacing the entire roof. We knew this wasn't a viable solution, so we began our process to demonstrate that the damage warranted a full roof replacement.

We presented all necessary evidence, and after a detailed review, the claim was approved! We replaced the roof, completed some fascia work, and addressed interior leaks, all of which were covered by the claim. Our client went from facing over $15,000 in repairs to only paying her $1,000 deductible.

We pride ourselves on ensuring our clients receive top-quality roofs and peace of mind, free from leaks and worries.

Visit www.bestroofingnow.com or call 704-605-6047

For more information on insurance claims or to file a complaint please visit ncdoi.gov

Upon completion, we couldn't help but beam with pride. Our efforts had not only revitalized a home but also added to the charm of the already magnificent Wyndridge Estates. Moments like these fuel our dedication, as we strive to enhance the beauty of neighborhoods, one roof at a time!

The old roof was meticulously removed, exposing decades of stories and memories. The team expertly placed a top-tier 50-year shingle in its place. But this wasn't just an ordinary shingle; it came with a complete, non-prorated warranty, ensuring the home's protection for future generations.

Now, as the sun sets over Salisbury, it casts a golden hue over the newly minted roof, a symbol of the home's renewed strength and beauty. Behind this transformation was the unmatched expertise of Best Roofing Now, ensuring that history stands tall, protected, and ever-resplendent.

Their newly minted roof serves as a symbol of the home's newfound power and beauty.
